title: Jamilah Lemieux and Amber Phillips
itunes:title: Jamilah Lemieux and Amber Phillips
description:
TUES 12/13- Breakfast Club has an interesting conversation about race, black women's voice in the media, Tomi Lahren and stop and frisk with Jamilah Lemieux and Amber Phillips. Charlamagne drops Donkey of the Day and gives the truth about Santa.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
